name: CreateCustomEnvironment
description:
Create a custom environment for your Vercel project.

This tool creates a custom environment in a specified Vercel project, excluding 'Production' or 'Preview' as names. Use it to set up tailored project environments.

parameters.name: project_unique_identifier_or_name
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or project name for which the custom environment is being created.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the team to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team to perform the request on behalf of. It is required to specify the unique team for the custom environment.

value_schema.description: The slug of the custom environment to create.

parameters.name: custom_environment_slug
parameters.description: Specify the slug for the new custom environment. It cannot be 'Production' or 'Preview'.

value_schema.description: The slug of the custom environment to create.

parameters.name: environment_description
parameters.description: Optional description for the custom environment being created.

value_schema.description: Description of the custom environment. This is optional.

parameters.name: branch_matcher_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of branch matcher: 'equals', 'startsWith', or 'endsWith'.

value_schema.description: Type of matcher. One of \"equals\", \"startsWith\", or \"endsWith\".

parameters.name: git_branch_name_pattern
parameters.description: Git branch name or part of it to match with the custom environment.

value_schema.description: Git branch name or portion thereof.

parameters.name: copy_environment_variables_from
parameters.description: Specify the source environment to copy variables from. This is optional.

value_schema.description: Where to copy environment variables from. This is optional.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The slug of the custom environment to create.

value_schema.description: The slug of the custom environment to create.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Description of the custom environment. This is optional.

value_schema.description: Description of the custom environment. This is optional.

parameters.name: branchMatcher.type
parameters.description: Type of matcher. One of \"equals\", \"startsWith\", or \"endsWith\".

value_schema.description: Type of matcher. One of \"equals\", \"startsWith\", or \"endsWith\".

parameters.name: branchMatcher.pattern
parameters.description: Git branch name or portion thereof.

value_schema.description: Git branch name or portion thereof.

parameters.name: copyEnvVarsFrom
parameters.description: Where to copy environment variables from. This is optional.

value_schema.description: Where to copy environment variables from. This is optional.
